ai_analysis: Crypto momentum metrics reveal a bifurcated market structure: 1) Large caps (BTC/ETH) showing relative strength with RSI 49.2/54.3 versus 2) Altcoin carnage (ADA RSI 48.16, NEAR RSI 40.58). This technical configuration mirrors December 2022 conditions where BTC dominance surged before altseason onset. Critical support clusters: BTC must hold $88,500 (200D MA & 2024 breakout level), ETH $3,000 (psychological + options OI concentration). The ETH/BTC ratio (0.0345) suggests altcoin underperformance may continue near-term. However, derivatives data shows extreme conditions - BTC funding rates negative (-0.005%/hr), ETH options skew at 2-year lows, and futures open interest down 18% MoN indicating capitulation. Our rotation model detects early accumulation in AI-related tokens (HYPE +3.69%) and staking derivatives (stETH -0.52% vs ETH -0.32%). The setup quality score improves to 6.8/10 when combining extreme fear, neutral RSI, and institutional stablecoin inflows.
